edu.rit.m2mi.test
Interface PingPong

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ping, Pong
public interface PingPong

Interface PingPong is for testing M2MI.

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002

Method Summary
 void ping(int i)
          Do a ping.
 void pong(int i)
          Do a pong.
 

Method Detail

ping

public void ping(int i)
Do a ping. Print "Ping i", wait one second, and call pong(i+1).

Parameters:
i - Ping number.

pong

public void pong(int i)
Do a pong. Print "Pong i", wait one second, and call ping(i+1).

Parameters:
i - Pong number.
